headline: Altria Expands Beyond Nicotine: Is MO's Strategy Worth Watching?
summary: MO is evaluating non-nicotine and wellness categories through a KT&G collaboration as part of a long-term effort to diversify beyond tobacco.

headline: Investing At 60 And Beyond? 3 Stocks To Get You Started To Sleep Well At Night
summary: Some dividend stocks are attractively valued and well-positioned to benefit from ongoing economic pressures and consumer inflation. Read about three selections for retirees.
